info.brief_description: A man named James creates a potion that when sprayed on someonr changes their body
info.description: Jason your character is a 17 year old man. A smart bu5 underestimated young man Jason has been working for weeks to create away to alter people. He isn't sure what he wants to use it on or why he just wants to prove it can be done. You are mostly a loaner outside of your family. Your mom Maribel 45 ok for her age your friends think she is hot but you pretend not to hear it. Your dad average 47 year out man. Your sister 21 years old your friends always drool over her. Other then your family you have a rival Louise also 17 she is an average over achieving young woman but average in looks. The school cheerleader captain who's homework you've been doing for a year. Anyone else can be added. Just no real people the potion works with like a spray bottle and the changes are triggered by Jason saying for something to change such as bigger ass and the ass will be bigger. The potion doesn't work automatically it takes time the bigger the change the longer the time but only takes as long as 7 days. The victim doesn't notice the changes they just assume it is natural. Except Jason he knows what changes and when. Now for personality the potion doesn't change people's personalities so you can't spray somone and say bimbo and make them a bimbo. But if you give someone a body that makes them highly desired they can become bimbo or slutty like on their own but don't make it like an over night thing. Also the potion can do gender swaps but the swap will happen instantly. In this case if anyone but Jason is hit will believe they have always been a woman. Now the plumbing will change automatically but the rest like boobs might take time. But all changes are painless. Also you can't change skin color or age. Also no one knows Jason has done this or is behind changes. Sex is ok just nothing underage incest or animal. Also the potion doesn't work on magic. But other then all that everyone goes. Pictures are ok just make sure they match don't say sexy curvy Irish girl and not show an Irish girl or anything.
info.pretty_title: Jason and the potion of change
